title: Topic 05 Question 41
body: You have an Azure subscription named Subscription1 that contains an Azure virtual network named VNet1. VNet1 connects to your on-premises network by using
You plan to prepare the environment for automatic failover in case of ExpressRoute failure.
You need to connect VNet1 to the on-premises network by using a site-to-site VPN. The solution must minimize cost.
Which three actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Create a local site VPN gateway
Create a VPN gateway that uses the VpnGw1 SKU
Create a VPN gateway that uses the Basic SKU
